title: Get a reservation group
description: Retrieves a specific reservation group resource from the BigQuery Reservation API by its name.

objective.narrative: A developer can programmatically inspect the properties of a reservation group, such as its assigned capacity or project associations. This is useful for monitoring or for making decisions before updating a reservation group or creating a new reservation within it.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_reservationgroup_get
regionTags.title: Get a reservation group
regionTags.description: Retrieves a specific reservation group resource from the BigQuery Reservation API by its name.
